original_text: “‘The men of Rhodes traded with you, and many coastlands were your customers; they paid you with ivory tusks and ebony.
korean_text: 드단 사람은 네 상인이 되었음이여 여러 섬이 너와 거래하여 상아와 박달나무를 네 물품과 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: The men of Rhodes traded with you
and many coastlands were your customers
they paid you with ivory tusks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 상아 송곳니로 너에게 대금을 지불했고
